name: Beginnings
description:
Here you can find explanations for some of the more intricate parts of the ''starting'' progression; if you want to see what you're able or supposed to do next, check out Bee Angry-er Advancements (keybind: $(k:key.advancements)). It is recommended to acquaint oneself with at least $(l:beginnings/garden_of_glass)this entry/$.
If you've decided to start in the $(l:beginnings/old_haven)Old Haven dimension/$, you should read the entry dedicated to it!
